mapper.select: select r.roleName from user u join role r on r.id in (u.roleIds) where u.account = #{account}
select DISTINCT concat(p.id,':',rbs.id) from role_detail rd join role_base_select rbs on FIND_IN_SET(rbs.id, rd.selectIds) join privilege p on p.id = rd.privilegeId where rd.roleId in (#{roleIds})
